doc.after: In the anarchist controlled areas Arag n and Catalonia in addition to the temporary military success there was a vast social revolution in which the workers and peasants collectivised land and industry and set up councils parallel to the paralyzed Republican government 264 This revolution was opposed by the Soviet supported communists who perhaps surprisingly campaigned against the loss of civil property rights 264
